trends: There has been one other sighting in Goderich
There were no other sightings in Goderich on or around April 26th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking .. Looking north from town, seen dark object , along shore of the lake, seemed stationery. At first I thought it may have been a kite, but closer I walked toward it, it was seemed much farther away, could not have been a kite. Reminded Me of war of the worlds movie..the site of it. It may have been a meteor or comet crossing the atmosphere. Unusual to see such an object in daylite. It seemed to be just parked in the sky. I decided to check out the web to see if anyone else saw it.
Summary: Looked like a stationery dark object, seemed to have pointed section.
